doc:
Peter Youngblood Hills https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Youngblood_Hills 0 Peter Youngblood Hills (born 28 January 1978) is an Anglo-American actor. He is perhaps best known for his supporting role of Sgt. Darrell "Shifty" Powers in HBO’s World War II mini-series, Band of Brothers. Peter_Youngblood_Hills ( born_28_January_1978 ) is an_Anglo-American_actor . He is_perhaps_best_known for his_supporting_role of Sgt._Darrell_"_Shifty_"_Powers in HBO ’s_World_War_II_mini-series , Band of Brothers .
